name: listMap
description: Iterates over every entry of the List and calls the closure function to work on the item of the list. The returned value will be set at the same index in a new list and the new list will be returned.

params.name: function
params.description:
Closure or a function reference that will be called for each of the iteration. The arguments passed to the callback are

item: value
index : current index for the iteration
list : reference of the original list

params.name: intialValue
params.description: Initial value which will be used for the reduce operation.
